A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a life long Star Wars fan I am disappointed... This film left more holes than TFA and similar to Rogue One did not live up to the hype of the trailer. Some scenes were good others were ruined.... Porgs were not needed.  No major fight scenes. Hux and Ren are just children around each other and are nothing compared to Tarkin and Vader.  Not sure if this is even worth seeing more than once.  If you are a hard core fan dont let the critics fool you. This was not a good film\, maybe a B- at most.
